title: Making an Iced Mocha Latte with the Ninja Coffee Bar™
description:
Greg shows you how easy it is to make a refreshing iced mocha latte, just one of Ninja’s many cold specialty drinks.

Learn more about the Ninja Coffee Bar™ at http://www.ninjacoffeebar.com. 

Get recipes for your Ninja Coffee Bar at http://www.ninjakitchen.com/recipes.
